title: (x) rounded western slab ID - (modified) PLINC Buffalo {Tiffany}
content:
hello, need some help with this fun font. Is it an actual font or a great slab (what is it?) with some rounded corners.. ? any help is appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017092417/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_81.png) | 116.72 KB |
author: fezenstein2

comments.content:
Where is this sample from?

This looks like a slightly modified Buffalo from [Plinc](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017092417/http:/www.photolettering.com/). At the moment it is only available to Beta Testers so my guess is this was done by some with those permissions.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017092417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/buffalo_3788.png)

You see they completed the cross-stroke on the A.
it's a poster by Invisible Creature so yeah i guess you're right.. bummer
